msContents.summary: This text is related to Dharmaśāstra. First blank folio has something in Granth script.

msItem.title: Smṛtiratnākara
msItem.author: Veṅkaṭeśa
msItem.incipit:
1v1 varṇāśramāṇāṃ dharmāṇām vyavasthātre yuge yuge . līlayaiva gṛhītecchāvapuṣe viṣṇave namaḥ . yatyreṣya brahmarudrādyāḥ yadīyājñāśrutismṛtī yaḥ prabhurjjagatā (gap of 10 syllables due to damaged margin.)
1v 2 parāye namaḥ . sarvāntaryāmiṇe sarvakarmmārādhyāyaviṣṇave sarvottarāya sarvātmaśaraṇyāya namonamaḥ yato vacanaratnānāmākaro tadujjvala smṛtiratnākaro nāma vakṣyate smṛtisaṃgra 1v 3 haḥ
msItem.explicit:
238r 4 taḥ taddhi kurvan yathāśakti prāpnoti paramāṃ gaitm . hariḥ oṃ iti hāritakulatilakasya sarasvativallabhāparināmadhe 238r 5 easy veṃkaṭanāthasya vaidikasārvabhaumasya kṛtiṣu ratnākaro nāmasadācārasaṃgrahassamāptaḥ … kṛtyākṛtyavivekadaṃ śṛ 238r 6 tiśatajñeyārthagarbhasatāmācārakramabodhakaṃ bhramatamovidhvaṃsahaṃsodayam traivargārthahitaprakāśakamimaṃ yusmanmude matkṛtaṃ san[to]
238r 7 nirma(la)da matsarāḥ kalayata smṛtyādiratnākaraṃ . kiñca ? yauktaṃ smṛtisuktamuktaṃ 238v1 hi tebhya sauvaidikasārvabhaumaṃ granthairyuktaṃ ṣaṣṭiśatena śiṣṭācārākaraṃ śīlanayā prabandhaṃ
msItem.colophon: 238v 4 nti santaḥ . ābde nandananāmake emakaragesu? cha kṛṣṇākhyake pakṣe paitrakatārake durudine śrīdetritiyā tithau 238v 5 śrīmat kauśikavaṃśajena likhitaṃ ratnakarabhaktudamācārapradamapayākhyaṃparitā śrīrāmabhaktena vai . oṃ śuba 238v 6 stutiratnakaraṃ saṃpūrṇaṃ hariḥ oṃ śubhamastu ..

supportDesc.foliation: Tamil numerals in the left margin.

handNote.desc: Readable. Some times not legible due mixing of clusters.

additions.desc: hariḥ oṃ śubhamastu in the left margin on 1v.

origin.origDate: According to colophon this manuscript was written in the Nandan Samvatsar which can range between 17th Cen -19th Cen. on Thursday, the third day of the second fortnight of some unidentified month. According to colophon scribe belongs to the kauśika family.

listBibl.bibl: Smṛtiratnakaraḥ nāma dharmaśāstram śrīmatdharitakulatilakavaidikasārvabhaumaiḥ śrīmadveṃkaṭanāthāryaiḥ akhilavaidikakarmanuṣṭhānasaukaryāya viracitam tacca śrkṛṣṇadasātmaja gaṅgāviṣṇunā paṇḍitaiḥ saṃśodhya svakīye lakṣmīvaikaṃṭeśvara mudraṇālaye mudrayitvā prakāśitaṃ śakābdā 1820 śamvat 1955 Kalyāṇa Muṃabai

encodingDesc.p: Spaces are added to separate words. Correction is shown using brackets and square brackets. Question mark is used to show illegible syllable.
